name: Witch Color?
description:
The nameless witch adopted a chimera kitten from a demon, but there is a problem, the chimera kitten is cursed. The witch has to return the kitty back to normal using the potions and her magic mirror. If she fails, the kitten will become evil and will eat her.

How to play 

Use the potion tubes to return it to normal

Move the potions around with the mouse, drag and drop them into the cauldron 

Look in the mirror to know what potions to use; select the potions that most closely resemble the object that appears in the mirror.

Special Thanks:

To the magic green potion
developers: Thom, the grooves and noise guy.
